title: philipma1957
author: philipma1957
created_time: December 11, 2023, 09:24:45 PMLast edit: December 11, 2023, 10:28:20 PM by philipma1957
content: I have 2 sapphire nitro cards 6800xt and I have them on a simple mining rig.I forgot settings to clock them. I run simple miner os.Any one have some good settings I can try.Better yet is team red the best miner for and kawpow.tiathey are poorly clocked and doing 26+26= 52 mhsand 200+200 watts

comments.author: Salamande
comments.body: Something isn't right for sure, as they should be about 35 mhs with 135WCore clock: 1250Mem clock: 1055core volt: 675 mvmem volt: 1300mvMVDDCI: 800 mv

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.created_time: December 12, 2023, 01:57:12 AMLast edit: December 12, 2023, 02:30:25 AM by philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Salamande on December 12, 2023, 12:31:03 AMSomething isn't right for sure, as they should be about 35 mhs with 135WCore clock: 1250Mem clock: 1055core volt: 675 mvmem volt: 1300mvMVDDCI: 800 mvthank you .  I will try them. I had theseCore clock: 1111.     now 1175Mem clock:  975.      now 1025core volt: 800 mv.   now 675mem volt: 1275mvMVDDCI: 800 mvwent from 90 to 104 for three units.watts dropped from 200 each to 170  nitro160 nitro145 the msithanks for the help.it is nice they make money again.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: For any video card there are good settings at https://hashrate.no/ depending on the coin and mining algorithmFor your video cardhttps://hashrate.no/gpus/6800xtAfter that, I use a wattmeter to find the optimal energy consumption solution.If you tweak it further, you can save up to 40-80 watts per mining rig.

comments.author: alecfisker
comments.body: check also termo paste in place, radiator clean, using new(upgrading) radiator added up 20% hashrate

comments.author: sp_
comments.created_time: December 15, 2023, 12:43:22 PMLast edit: December 15, 2023, 01:18:39 PM by sp_
comments.body: You can mine KAWPOW+ZIL with the Team Black Miner with no increase in the power usage and more profit. (0.5% fee vs 2% fee in Team Red)Team Black Miner 35MHASH kawpow+70MHASH ZIL (+0.1459 USD/day) Note that crazypool.org has a 15% fee on zilmining. but other pools are supported with the  --zil-only parameter.use v2.15 for the best performance

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: alecfisker on December 15, 2023, 09:12:31 AMcheck also termo paste in place, radiator clean, using new(upgrading) radiator added up 20% hashrateThermal paste must be changed during mining, but it is better to do this when the video card’s warranty has expired. The thermal paste on a warranty video card is changed when without replacing it is impossible to mine without overheating, as was the case on video cards 3080 and 3090. The 6800xt video card is not very hot, so if there is a warranty and the temperature is low, then it is better not to open the seals.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: hey what works for Nvidia kawpow I use t-rex 26.8anything better?

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on February 14, 2024, 05:47:53 PMhey what works for Nvidia kawpow I use t-rex 26.8anything better?I use gminer.  Partly because I can run it for both my Nvidia & AMD rigs, but I did do some testing in the past that found gminer to be the best miner for my rigs.  No idea if that remains true today, but if you wanted to be pointed in the right direction of mining software to test, that's where's I'd steer you.  I've also found it to be rock solid.When mining profitability was constantly changing between coins I used the nicehash miner and liked that it would auto-change to the most profitable chain to mine, but now that KawPow seems to be dominating pretty steadily, that's no longer necessary.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on February 14, 2024, 05:47:53 PMhey what works for Nvidia kawpow I use t-rex 26.8anything better?If you configure your Nvidia video cards to mine this coin, then the profit will be greater than with the kawpow algorithm.You will also really like the energy consumption when mining Gram.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5483750.msg63593981#msg63593981pool https://ton.ninjaYou will receive the settings when you connect your TON wallet.
